component.name: Micro Text Editor
component.summary: A modern and intuitive terminal-based text editor

description.p: Amicro is a terminal-based text editor that aims to be easy to use and intuitive, while also taking advantage of the capabilities of modern terminals. It comes as a single, batteries-included, static binary with no dependencies; you can download and use it right now!

As its name indicates, micro aims to be somewhat of a successor to the nano editor by being easy to install and use. It strives to be enjoyable as a full- time editor for people who prefer to work in a terminal, or those who regularly edit files over SSH.
